center_subtitle1.en: 🚀 Try It Now, in 3 Simple Steps 🚀

step_one.en: Step 1: Export Review List from E-commerce Platform
step_one.zh: 第 1 步：从电商平台导出评价列表

step_one_subtitle.en: Prepare the exported .xlsx review list file before analysis
step_one_subtitle.zh: 请在分析前准备好导出的 .xlsx 评价列表文件

step_one_instruction.en: How to Export Reviews from E-commerce Platforms
step_one_instruction.zh: 如何将电商平台的评价导出为 .xlsx 文件

step_one_write1.en: We support nearly all popular browser extensions, including Xiaowangshen, Dian Tou Shi, and A Ming Tool.
step_one_write1.zh: 许多你熟悉的网页插件都可以将电商网站的产品评价导出，我们支持几乎所有主流插件，无论是小旺神、店透视，还是阿明工具，都不在话下

step_one_write2.en: Choose your favorite extension to export the review list. We are compatible with them all.
step_one_write2.zh: 你可以选择使用你最喜欢的插件导出评价列表，请只管点击上传，无需担心适配问题

step_one_write3.zh: 在导出时请选择 .xlsx 格式

step_two_markdown.zh: 第 2 步：上传导出的评价列表

step_two_uploaded.zh: 直接拖拽或点击即可上传本地文件

step_two_col2_markdown.en: ##### Please upload the review list on the right 👉
step_two_col2_markdown.zh: ##### 请在右边上传评价列表👉

step_two_col2_markdown2.en: ✅ Use the .xlsx format</br>✅ Upload the file unmodified
step_two_col2_markdown2.zh: ✅ 使用 .xlsx 格式</br>✅ 上传原始文件，请勿修改内容

step_two_warning.en: Please upload a .xlsx file that contains review list first.
step_two_warning.zh: 请先上传包含评价列表的表格文件

step_two_success1.en: File uploaded successfully! Your file contains {} valid reviews.</br>Due to the capacity limit of the test version, the first {} valid reviews will be analyzed.
step_two_success1.zh: 文件上传成功！您的文件共包含 {} 条有效评价内容，</br>受测试版容量限制，会为您分析前 {} 条有效评价

step_two_success2.en: File uploaded successfully! Your file contains {} valid reviews.
step_two_success2.zh: 文件上传成功！您的文件共包含{}条有效评价内容

step_two_expander.en: Expand the review list to be analyzed
step_two_expander.zh: 展开将要分析的评价列表

step_two_with_markdown.en: *Review content is combined for the first review and subsequent follow-up comments from the same user*
step_two_with_markdown.zh: *评价内容已合并同一用户的首次评价和后续追评*

step_two_error.en: File is incorrect. Please make sure you upload a valid file containing review content.
step_two_error.zh: 文件出错。请确保您上传的是一个包含评价内容的有效文件

step_three_markdown.en: Step 3: Customize and Start Your Analysis 🚀
step_three_markdown.zh: 第 3 步：选择分析维度，开始分析 🚀

step_three_markdown2.en: Enter product information and your focus to obtain more customized analysis results
step_three_markdown2.zh: 输入产品信息及您期待的分析侧重点，得到更有针对性的分析结果

step_three_prod_info-placeholder.en: E.g., electric toothbrush, infant formula, women's dresses...
step_three_prod_info-placeholder.zh: 如：电动牙刷、婴幼儿奶粉、女式连衣裙...

step_three_selected_focus.zh: 请选择您的总结侧重点

step_three_advanced_options_markdown.en: Enter a specific question you want to know from the review list
step_three_advanced_options_markdown.zh: 请输入您想从评价列表中了解的具体问题

step_three_input_question.en: Please enter in the form of a question

step_three_input_question_placeholder.en: E.g., Do customers like feature A of this product?
step_three_input_question_placeholder.zh: 如：客户在评价中有没有提到主播或者直播间？

step_three_step3b_col1.en: Select the model you want to use
step_three_step3b_col1.zh: 请选择您要使用的模型

step_three_selected_model.en: Model Selection (please refer to the model comparison table below for model selection)
step_three_selected_model.zh: 模型选择（请参考下方模型对比表格进行模型选择）

step_three_analyze_result.en: Analysis results are being generated, please wait 5-10 seconds...</br>Please do not click the 【Start Analysis】 button repeatedly.
step_three_analyze_result.zh: 分析结果正在生成，请等待5-10秒...</br>请不要重复点击【开始分析】按钮
